mil7.7.6:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘meghassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.7.6:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena uppannaṃ kilesarajojallaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
mil7.7.6:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, meghassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.6:2.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, megho pathaviyā uṇhaṃ nibbāpeti;
mil7.7.6:2.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena mettābhāvanāya sadevako loko nibbāpetabbo.
mil7.7.6:2.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, meghassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.6:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, megho sabbabījāni viruhāpeti;
mil7.7.6:3.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbasattānaṃ saddhaṃ uppādetvā taṃ saddhābījaṃ tīsu sampattīsu ropetabbaṃ, dibbamānusikāsu sukhasampattīsu yāvaparamatthanibbānasukhasampatti.
mil7.7.6:3.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, meghassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.6:4.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, megho ututo samuṭṭhahitvā dharaṇitalaruhe tiṇarukkhalatāgumbaosadhivanappatayo parirakkhati;
mil7.7.6:4.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yoniso manasikāraṃ nibbattetvā tena yoniso manasikārena samaṇadhammo parirakkhitabbo, yoniso manasikāramūlakā sabbe kusalā dhammā.
mil7.7.6:4.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, meghassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.6:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, megho vassamāno naditaḷākapokkharaṇiyo kandarapadarasarasobbhaudapānāni ca paripūreti udakadhārāhi;
mil7.7.6:5.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āgamapariyattiyā dhammameghamabhivassayitvā adhigamakāmānaṃ mānasaṃ paripūrayitabbaṃ.
mil7.7.6:5.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, meghassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
